snippet: It was the first big change at the consumer products maker since its new chief executive took over last month.
abstract: Procter & Gamble reorganizes its business into four new divisions.
lead_paragraph: It was the first big change at the consumer products maker since its new chief executive took over last month.

headline.main: An Overhaul Sorts P.&G. Into 4 Units
headline.print_headline: An Overhaul Sorts P.&G. Into 4 Units
